extension.summary: Extended version of the TIDAL music add-on
extension.description:
Play music and video from TIDAL music streaming service.
Requires subscription. Visit tidal.com for details.

Spielt Music und Videos vom Streaming-Dienst TIDAL.
Es wird ein Abbonement benötigt. Siehe tidal.com für Details.
extension.disclaimer: This is an unofficial client and is not supported nor endorsed by TIDAL.
Dies ist eine inoffizieller Client, der von TIDAL nicht unterstützt wird.

extension.news: v2.1.3 (2023-10-03) - Added PKCE as second login method additionally to the device code link method: - Now every device type from TIDAL apks can be used to login - The correct login method is determined automatically - Added support for HiRes FLAC playback: - TIDAL supports HiRes FLAC playback since V2.87 of the original TIDAL Android app - There are 4 new device types available: 'Hi Res', 'Dolby Atmos Hi Res', 'Clear Hi Res' and 'Clear Dolby Atmos Hi Res' - Only this device types will play streams in HiRes FLAC up to 192 kHz, 24 Bit. - All other device types will play MQA master audio and not HiRes. - There is a new "HiRes" label extension for track and album items. - Added 'HiRes' to the Explore page to browse for HiRes content - Added experimental support for TIDAL live broadcasts: - Live broadcasts can be found under 'Home'->'Live' - Other small changes: - Added search method for user profiles. Please note that not all device types support this. - Inserted missing context menu items "Queue item" and "Play next" to tracks in Kodi 20
